name: Leorix
summary: Enterprise AI platform that unifies CRM, business intelligence, workflow automation, and lead management in one hub. AI-powered pipeline tracking and data integration help GTM teams connect acquisition data to closed revenue without juggling multiple tools.
gtm_use_cases: Track the full journey from organic search visit to closed deal with AI-powered pipeline intelligence
Automate lead enrichment, scoring, and nurture sequences triggered by content engagement
Report on marketing-sourced pipeline and revenue attribution with integrated business intelligence

name: Google Analytics 4
summary: Google's event-based web and app analytics platform. Foundation for measuring user acquisition, engagement, and conversion across the entire GTM funnel.
gtm_use_cases: Measure organic search contribution to signups and revenue events
Build acquisition channel reports for GTM performance reviews
Set up conversion funnels to identify drop-off points in the user journey

name: Mixpanel
summary: Product analytics platform focused on user behavior, retention, and funnel analysis. Helps GTM teams understand what users do after they arrive, not just how they got there.
gtm_use_cases: Analyze activation funnels to identify where new signups drop off
Segment user behavior by acquisition channel to measure SEO traffic quality
Track feature adoption for product-led growth motions

name: Amplitude
summary: Digital analytics platform with strong cohort analysis, experimentation, and behavioral segmentation. Connects acquisition data to in-product behavior for full-funnel GTM visibility.
gtm_use_cases: Build cohort analyses comparing organic search users to other acquisition channels
Identify behavioral signals that predict conversion from free to paid
Measure the downstream revenue impact of specific content campaigns

name: Segment
summary: Customer data platform that collects, cleans, and routes event data to analytics, marketing, and warehouse tools. The plumbing layer that makes full-funnel GTM measurement possible.
gtm_use_cases: Unify user identity across marketing site, product, and CRM
Route acquisition source data to analytics and activation tools
Build a single source of truth for GTM metrics across the stack

name: PostHog
summary: Open-source product analytics suite with feature flags, session recordings, experimentation, and surveys. A single platform for understanding and optimizing the post-acquisition experience.
gtm_use_cases: Run A/B tests on landing pages and onboarding flows to improve activation
Record user sessions to diagnose why organic traffic is not converting
Deploy feature flags to progressively roll out new GTM experiments

name: Intercom
summary: Customer messaging platform with live chat, bots, and product tours. Connects the marketing site experience to in-product engagement and support.
gtm_use_cases: Deploy targeted messages to organic search visitors based on the page they landed on
Build onboarding product tours that activate new signups
Use chatbot qualification to route high-intent visitors to sales

name: Customer.io
summary: Event-driven messaging platform for email, push, SMS, and in-app messages. Lets GTM teams build behavior-triggered lifecycle campaigns tied to product events.
gtm_use_cases: Build onboarding email sequences triggered by signup source and behavior
Send re-engagement campaigns to users who visited pricing pages but did not convert
Automate expansion and upsell messaging based on product usage milestones

name: Clearbit
summary: B2B data enrichment platform that appends firmographic and technographic data to leads and accounts. Helps GTM teams understand who is visiting and convert anonymous traffic into qualified leads.
gtm_use_cases: Enrich inbound leads with company size, industry, and tech stack data
Identify high-value accounts visiting the site from organic search
Score and route leads based on ICP fit using enriched data

name: Mutiny
summary: Website personalization platform for B2B that changes headlines, CTAs, and content based on visitor attributes. Turns generic SEO landing pages into targeted conversion experiences.
gtm_use_cases: Personalize landing page messaging by industry or company size for organic visitors
A/B test different value propositions on high-traffic SEO pages
Increase conversion rates on bottom-of-funnel pages without building separate pages per segment

name: Salesforce
summary: Enterprise CRM platform that serves as the system of record for pipeline, deals, and revenue. Essential for connecting marketing-sourced leads to closed revenue in GTM reporting.
gtm_use_cases: Attribute closed revenue back to organic search campaigns and content
Track lead-to-opportunity conversion rates by acquisition channel
Build GTM dashboards that connect content investment to pipeline generation

name: Stripe
summary: Payment processing and billing infrastructure. For product-led GTM motions, Stripe is where revenue actually happens and where self-serve conversion data lives.
gtm_use_cases: Track self-serve conversion and revenue as the primary GEO outcome metric
Analyze trial-to-paid conversion rates segmented by acquisition source
Build revenue dashboards that close the loop from content to cash

name: Hotjar
summary: Heatmaps, session recordings, and surveys for understanding user behavior on websites. Helps GTM teams see what visitors actually do on landing pages.
gtm_use_cases: Identify where organic search visitors drop off on key landing pages
Gather qualitative feedback from visitors about messaging clarity
Validate landing page layout and CTA placement with heatmap data

name: Looker
summary: Enterprise BI platform for building semantic data models and dashboards. Enables GTM teams to build cross-functional reporting that connects marketing, product, and revenue data.
gtm_use_cases: Build a single GTM metrics dashboard spanning acquisition through retention
Create self-serve reports for GTM leaders to track SEO-to-revenue attribution
Model LTV by acquisition channel to inform GTM investment decisions

name: Optimizely
summary: Experimentation and feature management platform covering web, feature flags, and full-stack experiments. The system of record for testing GTM hypotheses.
gtm_use_cases: Run A/B tests on SEO landing pages to optimize conversion rates
Test different pricing page layouts and CTAs for self-serve conversion
Experiment with onboarding flows to improve activation rates
